name: One-Handed
description: The One-Handed skill determines your damage with one-handed weapons including daggers, swords, maces, and war axes.

perks.name: Armsman
perks.description: One-Handed weapons do 20% more damage per rank

perks.name: Bladesman
perks.description: Attacks with swords have a 10% chance per rank of doing critical damage

perks.name: Bone Breaker
perks.description: Attacks with maces ignore 25% of armor per rank

perks.name: Hack and Slash
perks.description: Attacks with war axes cause extra bleeding damage

perks.name: Dual Flurry
perks.description: Dual wielding attacks are 20% faster per rank

perks.name: Savage Strike
perks.description: Standing power attacks do 25% bonus damage with a chance to decapitate

perks.name: Critical Charge
perks.description: Can do a one-handed power attack while sprinting

perks.name: Dual Savagery
perks.description: Dual wielding power attacks do 50% bonus damage

perks.name: Paralyzing Strike
perks.description: Backwards power attack has a 25% chance to paralyze

name: Destruction
description: The Destruction skill determines the effectiveness of offensive spells like fire, frost, and shock magic.

perks.name: Novice Destruction
perks.description: Cast Novice level Destruction spells for half magicka

perks.name: Destruction Dual Casting
perks.description: Dual casting a Destruction spell overcharges it for more effectiveness

perks.name: Augmented Flames
perks.description: Fire spells do 25% more damage per rank

perks.name: Augmented Frost
perks.description: Frost spells do 25% more damage per rank

perks.name: Augmented Shock
perks.description: Shock spells do 25% more damage per rank

perks.name: Intense Flames
perks.description: Fire spells can set enemies on fire

perks.name: Deep Freeze
perks.description: Frost spells can freeze enemies

perks.name: Disintegrate
perks.description: Shock spells disintegrate targets

perks.name: Master Destruction
perks.description: Cast Master level Destruction spells for half magicka

name: Sneak
description: The Sneak skill governs your ability to escape detection. Higher skill levels improve stealth and sneak attack damage.

perks.name: Stealth
perks.description: You are 20% harder to detect per rank when sneaking

perks.name: Muffled Movement
perks.description: Noise from armor is reduced 50%

perks.name: Light Foot
perks.description: You won't trigger pressure plates

perks.name: Silent Roll
perks.description: Sprinting while sneaking executes a silent forward roll

perks.name: Backstab
perks.description: Sneak attacks with one-handed weapons do 6x damage

perks.name: Deadly Aim
perks.description: Sneak attacks with bows do 3x damage

perks.name: Assassin's Blade
perks.description: Sneak attacks with daggers do 15x damage

perks.name: Silence
perks.description: Walking and running does not affect detection

perks.name: Shadow Warrior
perks.description: Crouching stops combat for a moment and forces distant opponents to search for a target

name: Archery
description: The Archery skill affects your damage and accuracy with bows and crossbows.

perks.name: Overdraw
perks.description: Bows do 20% more damage per rank

perks.name: Eagle Eye
perks.description: Pressing Block while aiming will zoom in your view

perks.name: Steady Hand
perks.description: Zooming in with a bow slows time by 25% per rank

perks.name: Power Shot
perks.description: Arrows stagger all but the largest opponents 50% of the time

perks.name: Quick Shot
perks.description: Can draw a bow 30% faster

perks.name: Ranger
perks.description: Able to move faster with a drawn bow

perks.name: Critical Shot
perks.description: 10% chance per rank of a critical hit that does extra damage

perks.name: Bullseye
perks.description: 15% chance of paralyzing the target for a few seconds

name: Smithing
description: The Smithing skill allows you to forge weapons and armor at forges and improve them at grindstones and workbenches.

perks.name: Steel Smithing
perks.description: Can create Steel armor and weapons at forges

perks.name: Arcane Blacksmith
perks.description: You can improve magical weapons and armor

perks.name: Dwarven Smithing
perks.description: Can create Dwarven armor and weapons at forges

perks.name: Elven Smithing
perks.description: Can create Elven armor and weapons at forges

perks.name: Advanced Armors
perks.description: Can create Scaled and Plate armor at forges

perks.name: Glass Smithing
perks.description: Can create Glass armor and weapons at forges

perks.name: Ebony Smithing
perks.description: Can create Ebony armor and weapons at forges

perks.name: Daedric Smithing
perks.description: Can create Daedric armor and weapons at forges

perks.name: Dragon Armor
perks.description: Can create Dragon armor at forges

name: Enchanting
description: The Enchanting skill allows you to add magical effects to your weapons and armor via the use of filled soul gems.

perks.name: Enchanter
perks.description: New enchantments are 20% stronger per rank

perks.name: Fire Enchanter
perks.description: Fire enchantments are 25% stronger

perks.name: Frost Enchanter
perks.description: Frost enchantments are 25% stronger

perks.name: Storm Enchanter
perks.description: Shock enchantments are 25% stronger

perks.name: Insightful Enchanter
perks.description: Skill enchantments are 25% stronger

perks.name: Corpus Enchanter
perks.description: Health, magicka, and stamina enchantments are 25% stronger

perks.name: Extra Effect
perks.description: Can put two enchantments on the same item
